data.text:
@SenatorDurbin FYI Obama separated families. Biden DIDN'T CLOSE BORDERS CAUSING HAVOC ACROSS COUNTRY.

UNDER BIDEN ADMINISTRATION: https://t.co/4iFxOxcMvL
-inflation up 21.5%
-shrinking value of paychecks
-trade deficit rose (goods&service) up 40%
-home prices up 37%
-gas rose $2.38 gal to $5+

@SenatorDurbin I want to know what happened to the 350,000 unaccompanied minors who crossed the border during Biden’s Open Border crisis. 
Where are those children Dick?
@SenatorDurbin 80 years and and can barely talk coherently. Just retire already!

@maxteks1969 @SenatorDurbin From what I've been reading, Liam's father is an asylum seeker here legally pending a hearing.

Do you have information revealing the 5 year old kid as a danger? The worst of the worst?
@TheFixerishot @SenatorDurbin That’s a lot of truth you are speaking there!
@SenatorDurbin I’d prefer Dick Durbin were detained in those conditions for sure!!

@SenatorDurbin You should Adopt Liam Ramos , and Albrego Garcia as family and welcome them in your home  ,….thats what you imposed on the American Citizens without our consent . We voted for Trump and the removal of All illegal immigrants and we won ,regardless of leftist crying & Complaints.

@SenatorDurbin You are one of the biggest pieces of dog shit in congress, you lie through your fucking teeth. Your party makes this huge problem for us then you send your domestic rioters out to engage law-enforcement and create chaos. Your party should be dismantled and all of you arrested.
